rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each land in your realm. [i](Your realm consists of up to one land of each of the basic land types.)[/i]
When this creature enters, you may search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: This creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
